name: Varfet
description:
A short and slightly satirical simulation of being the boss at a shipyard in the 60s - where human suffering is a numbers game.

Hold down ~SPACE~ to recenter your cursor

Controls:
Hover over an item and hold LMB to grab
Scroll while holding to rotate the item
Right click a pile of paper to sift through it

This is an iteration on a previous game jam game Varf
